post:
Hello everyone, 

We have two 20 EUR / mo servers ready to go for anyone who wish to have a server in the mighty viking lands of Norway!

**Who are we?**

Terrahost is a hosting provider located in Sandefjord, Norway. We own and operate our own datacenters. We have transits with Telenor and Altibox and operate our own BGP backed network. 

LG: http://lg.terrahost.no/  
AS INFO: https://bgp.he.net/AS203629


**Server 1**  
Intel Pentium G3258 3.2GHz  
8GB RAM  
250GB SSD  
5 TB @ 1Gbps  

20 EUR / mo (199 NOK)

Order here: https://terrahost.no/handlekurv/1739


**Server 2**  
Intel Pentium G3220 3GHz  
8GB RAM  
2TB SATA  
500GB SATA  
5 TB @ 1Gbps  

20 EUR / mo (199 NOK)

Order here: https://terrahost.no/handlekurv/1740

**We only have these two. Might go quickly :-) **  
** VAT is removed once logged in.**
